short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Engage without burning out: Add Comment Generator for Instagram to your engagement strategy and write genuine comments with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coming up with original ways to engage and comment on Instagram™ can be really time-consuming. However, with Comment Generator for IG, this is no longer the case. 

Customers value this Instagram™ extension because:
⭐️ it cut time drastically and helped relieve work load 
⭐️ it has significantly increased meaningful conversations
⭐️ it has helped them to attract new Instagram™ followers
⭐️ generated comments are natural and not "bot language"
⁣
By using the Comment Generator as part of your engagement strategy, you are more likely to spark conversations, gain attention from the content creator, and attract potential followers. Meaningful engagement can lead to lasting connections within the Instagram™ community.⁣

★ Key features of Comment Generator:
✓ Easy to set up and get started to engage efficiently on Instagram™
✓ Choose from four different commenting styles
✓ Works in all major European and Non-European languages
✓ Supports many different domains including fashion, design, photography, sports, programming, news, ...

★ Get started
Sign up for free: Comment Generator requires an account you can create immediately after the installation. You'll get a 7-day free trial with a quota of 30 comments (no credit card required) and can upgrade your account for more. Visit https://www.comment-generator.com/pricing for pricing details. Cancel anytime.

★ NEW: Comment Generator for LinkedIn
Attract potential leads and prospects with ease using comment generator for LinkedIn. Visit https://www.comment-generator.com/comment-generator-for-linkedin for more information.

★ Contact the makers of Comment Generator
If you want to report a bug or have a feature request, please do not hesitate to reach me directly at mail@comment-generator.com. You can find more info on the extension usage under https://www.comment-generator.com/getting-started-comment-generator-for-instagram

★ Disclaimer
Comment Generator does not belong or is not related to the official Instagram™ application / website in any ways. It is an unofficial extension that is developed and maintained independently. Comment Generator (browser extension) is a wrapper to the original Instagram™ web application and makes it more usable by adding functionality to add auto-generated comments. This Chrome plugin is not endorsed or certified by any third party. All third party logos and trademarks displayed on this Chrome plugin are properties of the third parties. Comment Generator is distributed AS IS. For more info and terms of service, visit our web site: https://comment-generator.com

★ Whats New:
1.6.1:
- Updated emoji icon for commenting style "Be funny".

1.6:
- Two new commenting styles added: 
1) Add an insight: Use it to generate thoughtful comments that add value. With this style, you offer relevant knowledge, fresh perspectives, or expert advice that deepens the discussion and showcases your expertise.
2) Share an experience: Connect on a personal level by sharing your own experiences. By linking the post to your journey or work, you foster a genuine connection that adds depth and relatability to the conversation. 

1.5.14:
- Fixed an issue were the icons were not showing up correctly.
- Added a LinkedIn info banner.

1.5.13:
- Added a button to the new Comment Generator for LinkedIn Chrome extension to the popup.

1.5.12:
- Fixed a bug related to disposable email detection.

1.5.11:
- Implemented new rules to prevent users with disposable email addresses from accessing this service.

1.5.10:
- Fixed an issue where the emoji buttons weren't clickable.

1.5.9:
- The emoji buttons didn't show up due to Instagram's™ latest update. This is now fixed.

1.5.8:
- Due to Instagram's™ recent update to the layout and design of posts when opened in a lightbox, the buttons to generate comments disappeared. This is now fixed. 

1.5.7:
- Introduced info box for new Comment Generator for Threads extension. For more information about this new extension, please visit https://www.comment-generator.com/extensions/comment-generator-for-threads

1.5.6:
- Updated extension's description

1.5.5:
- Added link to Comment Generator for Threads extension.

1.5.4:
- Fixed design issues in popup and navigation.

1.5.3:
- Added a menu item to Instagram™ to allow users of the extension find Comment Generator's IG profile.

1.5.2:
- Instagram™ has updated its page structure. This version fixes a bug where the extension wasn't able to extract the caption of a post to generate a comment.

1.5.1:
- Increased reliability of generating comments. 

1.5:
- You can now choose from four different commenting styles: Genuinely agree, politely disagree (beta), act surprised (beta), be funny (beta).
- A math captcha needs to be solved to sign up to a free trial.

1.4.6:
- Reduced free quota due to user fraud

1.4.5:
- Fixed an issue where no comment could be generated when a post was opened in a new tab.

1.4.4:
- Updated extension branding of Comment Generator

1.4.3:
- Increased reliability of generating comments
- Improved user experience when quota runs out
- Fixed a bug where the welcome model wasn't showing up correctly

1.4.2:
- Improved error handling for extension stability.

1.4.1:
- Added support for advanced error handling.

1.4:
- Instagram™ is slowly rolling out a new version of Instagram™ web. This version aims to ensure full functionality on the new as well as older version of Instagram™ web. 

1.3.11:
- Fixed an issue that caused unintended behaviour when the notification panel was opened.

1.3.10:
- Fixed an issue that caused error "No caption to generate a comment".

1.3.9:
- Updated the URL to review this extension.

1.3.8:
- Fixed a bug where user couldn't generate a comment on posts that have been opened in a new window.

1.3.7:
- Support for promotions

1.3.6:
- Improved error handling

1.3.5:
- Updated disposable email validation

1.3.4:
- Added validation to identify disposable emails

1.3.3:
- Minor bug fixes

1.3.2:
- Minor bug fixes

1.3.1:
- Introduced quota to free trial of Comment Generator.

1.3:
- Added typewriter effect when populating generated comment in commenting box.

1.2.3:
- Improved error handling of comment generation where posts have no captions. 

1.2.2:
- Fixed a bug where the textarea didn't populate the generated comment. 

1.2.1:
- Minor layout fix on generate button for reels.

1.2:
- Added help modal to display on instagram.com after installation
- Added loading icon next to generate button
- Added legal notice to extension popup
- Fixed layout issue on generate button

1.1.2:
- Updated website URL

1.1.1:
- Minor bug fixes
